TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi EndTagRegex extends System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex

Docs.summary: Provides a regular expression to parse an end tag of an HTML element, an XML element, or an ASP.NET web server control tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The EndTagRegex class provides a regular expression to parse an end tag (for example, ``). > [!NOTE] > The classes are used internally by the .NET Framework to parse ASP.NET pages.
